attributes.action: remove Theresa May from office and implement the brexit we voted for in full
attributes.additional_details: The CONservatives have had two years to make significant trade deals outside of the EU for when we leave and have done nothing ,We need a PM with backbone,she squanders tax payers money,scourns democray because it doesn't fit her agenda ,floods the country with undesirables ,panders to immigrants and their ilk all the time imposing austerity measures on the people of Britain  making it hard for even the most dedicated worker to earn a decent living ,17.4 million people voted out and she doesn't
attributes.background:
Theresa May has destroyed the brexit we voted for and pretty much told 17.4 million people that their vote doesn't matter ,She has always been a remainer,
                  Bring back democracy ,leave the EU ,no divorce bill just a clean complete break so we can take back control of our country

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked.

 If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
